class.rdfs:comment: A music recording (track), usually a single song.
class.rdfs:label: MusicRecording

schema:byArtist.rdfs:comment: The artist that performed this album or recording.
schema:byArtist.rdfs:label: byArtist

schema:duration.rdfs:comment: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).
schema:duration.rdfs:label: duration

schema:inAlbum.rdfs:comment: The album to which this recording belongs.
schema:inAlbum.rdfs:label: inAlbum

schema:inPlaylist.rdfs:comment: The playlist to which this recording belongs.
schema:inPlaylist.rdfs:label: inPlaylist

schema:isrcCode.rdfs:comment: The International Standard Recording Code for the recording.
schema:isrcCode.rdfs:label: isrcCode

schema:recordingOf.rdfs:comment: The composition this track is a recording of.
schema:recordingOf.rdfs:label: recordingOf
